languages.text: Виновником трагедии, постигшей мир-улей, оказался безумный гемункул.

traits.locale_text: Виновником трагедии, постигшей Гордость Сантиэля, оказался безумный гемункул. Ксенос признался, что именно он стоит за исчезновением звезды, и вскоре друкари придут за следующей.

languages.text: The perpetrator of the tragedy that befell hive world turned out to be a mad Haemonculus.
languages.original_text: Виновником трагедии, постигшей мир-улей, оказался безумный гемункул.

traits.locale_text: The perpetrator of the tragedy that befell Santiel's Pride turned out to be a mad haemonculus. The xenos admitted that he was behind the star's disappearance, and that the Drukhari would soon be back for the next one.

The perpetrator of the tragedy that befell Santiel's Pride turned out to be a mad haemonculus. The xenos admitted that he was behind the star's disappearance, and that the Drukhari would soon be back for the next one.

The perpetrator of the tragedy that befell Santiel's Pride turned out to be a mad haemonculus. The xenos admitted that he was behind the star's disappearance, and that the Drukhari would soon be back for the next one.
The perpetrator of the tragedy that befell hive world turned out to be a mad Haemonculus.

languages.text: 这个巢都世界灾变的幕后黑手，原来是个疯狂的血伶人。
languages.original_text: The perpetrator of the tragedy that befell hive world turned out to be a mad Haemonculus.

traits.locale_text: 这个巢都世界灾变的幕后黑手，原来是个疯狂的血伶人。

languages.text: 過密惑星を襲った悲劇の犯人は、狂気のハモンキュラスだったことが判明した。
languages.original_text: The perpetrator of the tragedy that befell hive world turned out to be a mad Haemonculus.

traits.locale_text: 過密惑星を襲った悲劇の犯人は、狂気のハモンキュラスだったことが判明した。

languages.text: El culpable de la tragedia que arrasó el mundo colmena ha resultado ser un Hemónculo loco.
languages.original_text: The perpetrator of the tragedy that befell hive world turned out to be a mad Haemonculus.

traits.locale_text: El culpable de la tragedia que arrasó el mundo colmena ha resultado ser un Hemónculo loco.

languages.text: Der Urheber der Tragödie, die über die Makropolwelt hereingebrochen ist, hat sich als wahnsinniger Haemonculus erwiesen.
languages.original_text: The perpetrator of the tragedy that befell hive world turned out to be a mad Haemonculus.

traits.locale_text: Der Urheber der Tragödie, die über die Makropolwelt hereingebrochen ist, hat sich als wahnsinniger Haemonculus erwiesen.

languages.text: Le responsable de la tragédie qui s'est abattue sur le monde ruche était en fait un hémoncule dément.
languages.original_text: The perpetrator of the tragedy that befell hive world turned out to be a mad Haemonculus.

traits.locale_text: Le responsable de la tragédie qui s'est abattue sur le monde ruche était en fait un hémoncule dément.

languages.text: Kovan dünyada yaşanan trajediye deli bir Haimonkulus'un sebep olduğu ortaya çıktı.
languages.original_text: The perpetrator of the tragedy that befell hive world turned out to be a mad Haemonculus.

traits.locale_text: Kovan dünyasında yaşanan trajediye deli bir Haimonkulus'un sebep olduğu ortaya çıktı.
